title: Studio Design Lead
description: Acid.info needs a web UI/UX design veteran & a design researcher to lead our team’s efforts. The chosen candidate will work closely with the studio lead and oversee all aspects of the design process—from R&D to prototyping and production. Alongside the skills to develop and maintain a state-of-the-art design system with diverse themes, the ability to manage the wider design team while creating a culture of collaboration and creativity is vital.
